text: Elham (; ) is a unisex name which means "inspiration". Related names include Ilham in Arabic and İlham or İlhami in Turkish. Ellie is used as a shortened form of Elham. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == * Elham Shaheen (born 1961), Egyptian actor * elham T. a grand daughter of Hossein Movaghar * Elham Nami, Iranian actress * Elham Jdi, Iranian actress * Elham Hamidi, Iranian actress == Related pages == * Ilham == References ==
title: Elham (given name)
